name: Hide Next Button on Duplicates
descr: Set to true if you want the next button to be removed on duplicated answers. Not recomended as it prevents data quality control. (If true, then highlighting the duplicates is automatically activated.

name: Duplicates highlighter
descr: Set to true if you want the duplicated answers to be visible.

name: Hide initial open ends
descr: Set to false if you want all open ends to be visible from the very begining.

name: Hide answers text
descr: Set to false if you want to show the answers text.
